p: Replacement of the hexyl group in compound 16a by 1-naphthalenyl group afforded compound 19a which was more active as cytotoxic agent against the three cancer cell lines. Although cytotoxicity of compound 19a was decreased on substitution with 4-CH 3/Cl groups on ring A, but the produced derivatives 19b, c were more active than their hexyl analogues 16b, c against MCF-7 and HT29 cells, Figure 6.
